meanings.definition: Able to be agreed upon or approved of
meanings.sent1: The quality of the product was acceptable to the customers.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior at the party was acceptable to her parents.
meanings.sent3: It was acceptable to wear a silly hat at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The idea of time being a river is acceptable in some philosophical theories.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made it clear what was acceptable behavior in the classroom.

meanings.sent1: The amount of food provided was acceptable for the party guests.
meanings.sent2: His performance in the play was acceptable to the director.
meanings.sent3: It was acceptable to use a spoon instead of a fork for the salad.
meanings.sent4: The level of noise in the room was just acceptable for studying.
meanings.sent5: The student's effort was barely acceptable for passing the exam.

meanings.sent1: The heat in the room was barely acceptable for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The taste of the dish was acceptable to most of the diners.
meanings.sent3: It was acceptable to listen to the same song on repeat for a while.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the bag was just acceptable for carrying around.
meanings.sent5: The noise level in the classroom was barely acceptable for learning.
